message.content:
I need to identify the line item in the income statement that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is typically called "Depreciation" in financial statements.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item named "Depreciation" with a value of 92870.67 on 2024-02-05.

Depreciation represents how the cost of tangible assets is allocated over their useful life, which matches the description in the task. This is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '92870.67'} }
```
